attributes.action: Allow advanced appointments for the Doctors/GP Surgery.
attributes.additional_details: Because, getting an appointment is almost impossible. Waiting a week or two is better than not getting one at all.
attributes.background: Change the “same day appointment” rule, so you can book appointments in advance.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to offer GP services are a matter for individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
